hero.title: ZEB KHAN
hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer
hero.description: I specialize in developing responsive web applications using modern frontend technologies and robust backend systems. Currently pursuing advanced studies at HAL Tokyo.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Showcasing my recent work and developed solutions

carMarketplace.title: Car Marketplace
carMarketplace.description: A comprehensive automotive marketplace featuring advanced filtering capabilities, secure user authentication, and an intuitive booking system. This full-stack application seamlessly integrates modern frontend technologies with robust backend services to deliver an exceptional car shopping experience.
results: Implemented complete user registration with email confirmation and two-factor authentication
Developed advanced AJAX filters and comprehensive car listings system
Integrated meeting scheduling with favorites and bookmarking functionality
Created presentation-ready mode with guided tour for demonstrations in Zoom

cafeDeParis.title: Cafe de Paris
cafeDeParis.description: An immersive digital experience for a French-Japanese fusion café, featuring cutting-edge WebGL effects and sophisticated animations. The platform combines artistic design with technical excellence to create a memorable, interactive showcase of the café's distinctive atmosphere.
results: Implemented WebGL-powered dynamic mesh gradient backgrounds with custom shaders
Developed advanced GSAP animations with parallax scrolling and ScrollTrigger
Created interactive UI with physics-based spring animations and element tracking
Designed bilingual Japanese/French menu with 3D card hover effects and marquee animations

mayu.title: Mayu
mayu.description: A modern, interactive digital magazine featuring seamless transitions, dynamic hover effects, and sophisticated navigation systems. The platform incorporates article carousels, scroll-based content switching, touch gestures, and comprehensive accessibility considerations.
results: Developed interactive web magazine with slideshow featuring preloading, autoplay, and touch gestures
Implemented advanced scroll-based UI with IntersectionObserver for dynamic header transforms
Created context-aware menu system with animated transitions and accessibility support
Designed modular JavaScript architecture with specialized controllers for UI components

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Zeb Khan, a full-stack developer from Pakistan currently pursuing advanced studies at HAL Tokyo. I am dedicated to creating user-centric web applications while continuously expanding my expertise in both frontend and backend technologies.
